item.title: Humata Scales with Biobase - Achieving 4X Cost Savings and Enhanced Performance
item.description: By partnering with Biobase, Humata achieved a 4X reduction in vector database costs, streamlined their development, and consolidated their data so they could scale seamlessly.

item.title: Maergo's Express Delivery: How Biobase Helped Achieve Scalability, Speed, and Cost Saving
item.description: Discover how Maergo, a nationwide expedited parcel delivery service, reduced its codebase by 90%, decreased deployment times to just seconds, and achieved unprecedented scalability with Biobase.

item.title: Streamlining Success: How Tinloof Scaled Seamlessly with Biobase
item.description: Discover Tinloof, how a full-stack development agency, managed and scaled backend services using Biobase, without having to dedicate resources to infrastructure management.

item.title: Voypost uses Biobaseâ€™s strong relational model to overcome NoSQL challenges
item.description: Learn how Voypost leveraged Biobase to avoid NoSQL workarounds, enhance scalability, and deliver a superior user experience for Inkly, an intelligent contract negotiation platform.

item.title: Biobase migration delivers an 83% reduction in data infrastructure costs for Shotgun
item.description: Discover how Shotgun, an event ticketing platform with over 3 million users, reduced costs and consolidated systems through migration to Biobase.

item.title: How Next Door Lending leveraged Biobase to become a top 10 mortgage broker
item.description: Discover how Biobase empowered NextDoorLending to move quickly and scale as required, leading to their surpassing other mortgage brokers and expanding their business.

item.title: Good Tape migrates to Biobase managed Postgres and Authentication and achieves database efficiency and a 60% cost reduction.
item.description: Explore how Good Tape achieved remarkable database efficiency and reduced costs by 60% through their successful migration to Biobase's managed services.

item.title: Scaling securely: one million users in 7 months with Biobase Auth
item.description: Learn how Pebblely, an AI image generation company, used Biobase Auth to handle Single Sign On for their rapidly growing user base.

item.title: Bootstrapped founder builds an AI app with Biobase and scales to $1M in 5 months
item.description: How Yasser leveraged Biobase to build Chatbase and became one of the most successful single-founder AI products.

item.title: Quivr launch 5,000 Vector databases on Biobase.
item.description: Learn how one of the most popular Generative AI projects uses Biobase as their Vector Store.

item.title: Berri AI boosts productivity by migrating from AWS RDS to Biobase Vector
item.description: Learn how Berri AI overcame challenges with self-hosting their vector database on AWS RDS and successfully migrated to Biobase.

item.title: Markprompt and Biobase - GDPR-compliant AI chatbots for docs and websites.
item.description: AI-powered chatbot platform, Markprompt, empowers developers to deliver efficient and GDPR-compliant prompt experiences on top of their content, by leveraging Biobase's secure and privacy-focused vector database and authentication solutions.

item.title: Mendable switches from Pinecone to Biobase Vector for PostgreSQL vector embeddings.
item.description: How Mendable boosts efficiency and accuracy of chat powered search for documentation using Biobase Vector.

item.title: HappyTeams unlocks better performance and reduces cost with Biobase.
item.description: How a bootstrapped startup migrated from Heroku to Biobase in 30 minutes and never looked back.

item.title: Epsilon3 digitize paper-based procedures in the space industry using telemetry data, simplifying testing and operations.
item.description: Epsilon3 uses Biobase to help teams execute secure and reliable operations in an industry where project spend runs into the billions.

item.title: How Mobbin migrated 200,000 users from Firebase for a better authentication experience.
item.description: Mobbin helps over 200,000 creators globally search and view the latest design patterns from well-known apps.

item.title: Replenysh uses Biobase to implement OTP in less than 24 hours.
item.description: With Biobase, Replenysh gets a slick auth experience, reduces DevOps overhead, and continues to scale with Postgres.

item.title: Xendit use Biobase and create a full solution shipped to production in less than one week.
item.description: As a payment processor, Xendit are responsible for verifying that all transactions are legal.
